about_the_game:
Welcome to KOPI, a family-friendly cooking game that can be enjoyed solo or with friends in co-op mode. In KOPI, you'll craft increasingly elaborate drinks and dishes for ever-demanding customers. Whether you're brewing, cooking, frying, cleaning, or serving, remember: it’s not over until the customer leaves happy.

Become a coffee alchemist

Brew lattes, americanos, mochas, and whip up breakfasts and snacks that dance on the taste buds. Get the kitchen ready, roll up your sleeves, and let the customers pour in.

Play for Laughs

Jump into the kitchen where the score doesn’t matter, but the laughs are endless. It's all about the fun and ridiculousness of what you can cook up.

Go Pro

Channel your inner barista and race against the clock to serve as many drinks and dishes as possible, aiming for that elusive 3-star rating. Whether you’re a master chef or a kitchen calamity, there’s room for everyone.

Key Features

  • Creative Recipes: Mix and match ingredients to create dishes and drinks.

  • Diverse Environments: Explore different café settings, each with unique challenges and charm.

  • Co-op Chaos: Team up with friends locally or online for cooperative gameplay that doubles the fun and the challenge.

  • Playful Visual Style: Delight in a playful visual style that transforms each scene into a charming miniature world.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Steam OS 3.0; Ubuntu 20.04 (5.4.0), CentOS 7
  • Processor: 4 Core, 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RX580, GTX1060, Ryzen Vega 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Vulkan AMD (21.11.3+) and NVIDIA (515.48+)
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Steam OS 3.0; Ubuntu 20.04 (5.4.0), CentOS 7
  • Processor: 6 Core, 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RX7600, RTX4060
  • Additional Notes: Vulkan AMD (21.11.3+) and NVIDIA (515.48+)

short_description: Step into a lively, family-friendly cooking game where you brew, cook, fry, clean, and serve quirky customers. Earn coins, unlock levels, and experience a playful visual style that transforms each scene into a charming miniature world. Ensure every customer leaves with a smile!
